verses.verse: Thou shalt not take up <WH5375> a false <WH7723> report <WH8088>: put <WH7896> not thy hand <WH3027> with the wicked <WH7563> to be an unrighteous <WH2555> witness <WH5707>.

Thou shalt not follow <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> to do evil <WH7451>; neither shalt thou speak <WH6030> in a cause <WH7379> to turn aside <WH5186> after <WH310> a multitude <WH7227> to wrest justice <WH5186>:
neither shalt thou favor <WH1921> a poor <WH1800> man in his cause <WH7379>.
If thou meet <WH6293> thine enemy <WH341>'s ox <WH7794> or his ass <WH2543> going astray <WH8582>, thou shalt surely <WH7725> bring it back <WH7725> to him again <WH7725>.

If thou see <WH7200> the ass <WH2543> of him that hateth <WH8130> thee lying <WH7257> under his burden <WH4853>, thou shalt forbear <WH2308> to leave <WH5800> him <WH5800>, thou shalt surely release it with him <WH5800>.
Thou shalt not wrest <WH5186> the justice <WH4941> due to thy poor <WH34> in his cause <WH7379>.
Keep thee far <WH7368> from a false <WH8267> matter <WH1697>; and the innocent <WH5355> and righteous <WH6662> slay <WH2026> thou not <WH6663>: for I will not justify the wicked <WH7563>.
And thou shalt take <WH3947> no bribe <WH7810>: for a bribe <WH7810> blindeth <WH5786> them that have sight <WH6493>, and perverteth <WH5557> the words <WH1697> of the righteous <WH6662>.

And a sojourner <WH1616> shalt thou not oppress <WH3905>: for ye know <WH3045> the heart <WH5315> of a sojourner <WH1616>, seeing <WH3588> ye were sojourners <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
And six <WH8337> years <WH8141> thou shalt sow <WH2232> thy land <WH776>, and shalt gather <WH622> in the increase thereof <WH8393>:

but the seventh <WH7637> year thou shalt let it rest <WH8058> and lie <WH5203> fallow <WH34>, that the poor of thy people <WH5971> may eat <WH398>: and what they leave <WH3499> the beast <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> shall eat <WH398>. In like manner thou shalt deal <WH6213> with thy vineyard <WH3754>, and with thy oliveyard <WH2132>.

Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt do <WH6213> thy work <WH4639>, and on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> thou shalt rest <WH7673>; that thine ox <WH7794> and thine ass <WH2543> may have rest <WH5117>, and the son <WH1121> of thy handmaid <WH519>, and the sojourner <WH1616>, may be refreshed <WH5314>.

And in all things that I have said <WH559> unto you take ye heed <WH8104>: and make no mention <WH2142> of the name <WH8034> of other <WH312> gods <WH430>, neither let it be heard <WH8085> out <WH5921> of thy mouth <WH6310>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH7272> thou shalt keep a feast <WH2287> unto me in the year <WH8141>.

The feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682> shalt thou keep <WH8104>: seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> unleavened bread <WH4682>, as I commanded <WH6680> thee <WH4150>, at the time appointed in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24> (for in it thou camest out <WH3318> from Egypt <WH4714>); and none shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me empty <WH7387>:

and the feast <WH2282> of harvest <WH7105>, the first-fruits <WH1061> of thy labors <WH4639>, which thou sowest <WH2232> in the field <WH7704>: and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering <WH614>, at the end <WH3318> of the year <WH8141>, when thou gatherest <WH622> in thy labors <WH4639> out of the field <WH7704>.
Three <WH7969> times <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> all thy males <WH2138> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH113> Jehovah <WH3068>.

Thou shalt not offer <WH2076> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with leavened bread <WH2557>; neither shall the fat <WH2459> of my feast <WH2282> remain <WH3885> all night until the morning <WH1242>.

The first <WH7225> of the first-fruits <WH1061> of thy ground <WH127> thou shalt bring <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068> thy God <WH430>. Thou shalt not boil <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in it mother <WH517>'s milk <WH2461>.
Behold <WH7971>, I send an angel <WH4397> before <WH6440> thee <WH8104>, to keep thee by the way <WH1870>, and to bring <WH935> thee into the place <WH4725> which I have prepared <WH3559>.

Take ye heed <WH8104> before <WH6440> him <WH8085>, and hearken unto his voice <WH6963>; provoke <WH4843> him not <WH5375>; for he will not pardon your transgression <WH6588>: for my name <WH8034> is in him <WH7130>.

But if thou shalt indeed <WH8085> hearken <WH8085> unto his voice <WH6963>, and do <WH6213> all that I speak <WH1696>; then I will be an enemy <WH340> unto thine enemies <WH341>, and an adversary <WH6887> unto thine adversaries <WH6696>.

For mine angel <WH4397> shall go <WH3212> before <WH6440> thee <WH935>, and bring thee in unto the Amorite <WH567>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, and the Perizzite <WH6522>, and the Canaanite <WH3669>, the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Jebusite <WH2983>: and I will cut them off <WH3582>.

Thou shalt not bow down <WH7812> to their gods <WH430>, nor serve <WH5647> them <WH6213>, nor do after their works <WH4639>; but thou shalt utterly <WH2040> overthrow <WH2040> them <WH7665>, and break in pieces <WH7665> their pillars <WH4676>.

And ye shall serve <WH5647> Jehovah <WH3068> your God <WH430>, and he will bless <WH1288> thy bread <WH3899>, and thy water <WH4325>; and I will take <WH5493> sickness <WH4245> away <WH5493> from the midst of thee <WH7130>.
There shall none cast her young <WH7921>, nor be barren <WH6135>, in thy land <WH776>: the number <WH4557> of thy days <WH3117> I will fulfil <WH4390>.

I will send <WH7971> my terror <WH367> before <WH6440> thee <WH2000>, and will discomfit all the people <WH5971> to whom thou shalt come <WH935>, and I will make <WH5414> all thine enemies <WH341> turn their backs unto thee <WH6203>.
And I will send <WH7971> the hornet <WH6880> before <WH6440> thee <WH1644>, which shall drive out the Hivite <WH2340>, the Canaanite <WH3669>, and the Hittite <WH2850>, from before thee <WH6440>.

I will not drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> thee in one <WH259> year <WH8141>, lest the land <WH776> become desolate <WH8077>, and the beasts <WH2416> of the field <WH7704> multiply against thee <WH7227>.
By little <WH4592> and little <WH4592> I will drive them out <WH1644> from before <WH6440> thee <WH6509>, until thou be increased, and inherit <WH5157> the land <WH776>.

And I will set <WH7896> thy border <WH1366> from the Red <WH5488> Sea <WH3220> even unto the sea <WH3220> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and from the wilderness <WH4057> unto the River <WH5104>: for I will deliver <WH5414> the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> into your hand <WH3027>; and thou shalt drive them out <WH1644> before thee <WH6440>.
Thou shalt make <WH3772> no covenant <WH1285> with them <WH430>, nor with their gods.
They shall not dwell <WH3427> in thy land <WH776>, lest they make thee sin <WH2398> against me <WH5647>; for if thou serve their gods <WH430>, it will surely be a snare unto thee <WH4170>.
